newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: KL tin unchanged at 14.72 rgt/kg.
newsitem.headline: KL tin unchanged at 14.72 rgt/kg.

text.p: Malaysia's tin price ended unchanged at 14.72 ringgit ($5.83) a kg after strong buying by institutions which ignored a sharp overnight fall on the London Metal Exchange (LME), traders said.
"There was some strong institutional support from Europeans and locals, and shortcovering as well after the major correction on the local market on Tuesday," said a trader.
The Kuala Lumpur Tin Market fell 19 cents on Tuesday after sharp losses posted by metals on the LME, especially tin which fell to an 18-month low of $5,810 before closing $180 down at $5,840.
